Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
I submitted two ads last week. It says it usually takes 1-2 days to review, but these have been pending for about a week, so I wanted to check on them.

Hey there! It sounds like your ads have been pending longer than usual. If your account is new or hasn't been verified yet, this might be the reason for the delay. Could you please provide the following details to help with the verification process?
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Account Email
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once you have these details, please email them to adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification. This will help expedite the review process.
If your account is already verified, let me know so we can explore other possibilities!
